description:
Deconstruction of an Object

Presented by Jeff Rush (Tau Productions Inc.)

An incremental deconstruction of a class definition identifying the key
elements such as layered namespaces, common attributes, lifecycle and
access controls. We'll also look at calling into, out of and through an
object, making classes extensible and various object behaviors like
containment, sequence, iteration and arithmetic.
title: Deconstruction of an Object (#62)
